segments.text: I see the water pouring over the edge of the sink, creating a puddle on the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's spreading quickly, and no one seems to notice.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think this could cause a lot of damage if it's not stopped soon.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is just standing there, drying dishes like nothing is wrong.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel frustrated that she's not paying attention.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are too busy with the cookies to notice the water.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder how long this has been going on.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think someone should really do something about it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The scene is so chaotic, yet everyone seems so calm.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe no one is reacting to the water.
segments.speaker: PAR
